title: What is software-defined power, and why should utilities take note?
description: Joe Richard of Schneider Electric discussed software-defined power at DTECH 2026 in San Diego, California, highlighting its potential for utility modernization.
content: Joe Richard of Schneider Electric discussed software-defined power at DTECH 2026 in San Diego, California, highlighting its potential for utility modernization.
